content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside w/ my husband and my neighbor.  my neighbor and i noticed about 3 bright green lights above the tree line then just shot up in the sky and disappeared.  it was a clear night, no rain and the stars where bright.  after the sighting saw several helicopters appear really fast and then left the area.
content.summary: Saw 3 bright green lights above tree line then shot up into the sky and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On that particular day, i was in my appartment and after i watched some videos about planet x/nibiru on youtube, i decided to take some pictures of the sun to see if i could locate that planet that so many people are talking about.  since it was cold and i didn't want to put some warm clothes on, i decided to take some shots from one of my son's bedroom window.  my camera, a nikon 7700 has a swivel screen so i didn't have to look at the sun directly. i took few shots to verify my settings and after i took few of them, i noticed that something must have been on my lens since i was seeing some dots on one of my photographs.  i checked my equipment and saw nothing.  i zoomed-in the shot i had just took and realized that there were three objects on it.  i took my head through the window and looked in that particular direction but the objects were gone.

on the picture we see 2 objects on the left hand side at about the 9 o'clock position.  there is also a small dash underneath it but i can't tell what it is.  it reminds me of those we see across the two above mentionned objetcs.  the third one  is by itself and below the sun at the 7 o'clock position.  this one has a slightly different shape and reflect the sun more. 

i was very excited to realized that i had took a photograph a three objects that could not be identified as a regular flying object.  i sent that picture to many people i know to get their thoughts on it.  they were all amazed.  i wished i had seen those objects with my own eyes.  that way i could have known from which direction they came from, where they where headind etc.  since i didn't hear anything and they didn't stay long, they may have just materialized right there and left the same way?
content.summary: Surprising appearance of 3 ufo

content.detailedDescription: We witnessed 3 red/orange lights orb shaped, that appeared to be pulsating they would appear and disapear. they were over hays, ks.      we watched them for about 15 minutes near the airport. i wish we would have taken pictures.
content.summary: My family and i witnessed 3 pulsating lights that appeared and disapeared over hays ks. they were not a plane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: Sent in two other reports...These also were recorded groups of ufos from march 8,23,and 30  2016.
content.summary: Various numbered groups of ufos in flight

content.detailedDescription: While observing night sky i caught "fleet" of eleven ufos in formation cruising through deep space.
content.summary: Fleet of (11) ufos travelling in deep space

content.detailedDescription: Peering through nightvision scope i caught pair of ufos travelling through deep space with another faster group of(6)crossing my view.
content.summary: Pair of ufos travelling in deep space filmed using nightvision monocular

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on break, i was a security officer. i noticed a object to the west of my location moving toward me. there was a beam of light originating from underneath and on the right side if the object, aimed 45% down toward the neighborhood. i then noticed the beam did not reach the ground, it stoped approx half way to the house and tree tops. the closer it got i noticed there was no sound. it came to a complete stop and remained motionless (the beam was no longer seen), approx 300 feet from me and approx 250 to 350feet in the air. a er nurse (rn) walked out for his break, he noticed it and exclamed, "what the hell is that." at which time three other rn's (floor nurses) got up off a bench seat and begain to observe it also. it remained motionless for approx 6 minutes then without physicaly pivioting it begain moving northward. i would estimate the speed ay 3 to 5 mph at all times it was observed in motion and again soundless. the object was flat at its base, seemed to have three different levels to the base. from there, trere were three arched structures, the outter two same heighth with the center structure taller. above them there appeared to be a small bank of atennas. the object was a flat terricota color. i made a sketch and wrote down time. date, discription, etc. my grandson however colored on and cut up that page years ago. i still remember what it looked like, and the name of the er nurse.
content.summary: First observed west moving east, at low alt, no sound. became stationary for several minutes then bagain moving north

content.detailedDescription:
17:15 paignton, devon, england
dur: about 15 min

i was in my backyard smoking, when i witnessed a white light orb at very high speeds, racing across the sky, being followed by a very large pulsating orb, that would seemingly telaport in a big flash of light, to sporadic areas of the night sky, while still following the fast moving orb. that is to say the flashing orb was not on a straight path. the fast orb was solid the whole time, while the white larger pulsating orb, would hover for 10 seconds, then in a huge flash of light, would disappear for 10 seconds, then reappear in a huge white flash of light in a sporadic position, and hover again for another ten seconds. all the while a helicopter was speeding through the sky, chasing after the speeding solid orb. i watched this for about 15 minutes, until they were completely out of my view. the lights were seen traveling from south over tor bay, heading eastward. the pulsating orb was easily 4 times bigger than an airplane light, at its brightest it was the size the moon appears to us. while the solid orb was about the size of a star in the sky. witnessing this was quite shocking honestly, ive never seen anything like it before. i am positive, the crafts were not of known origin.
content.summary: Teleporting ufo, following an orb ufo, being chased by a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my apt. bldg. facing east taking pics of some dramatic clouds around noon or a bit before that time today. the ceiling was about 2900 ft. -- i saw that on cable's weatherscan just before i went out to take pics.  typically, i only discovered the object when i was going thru the pics on my computer. i know it wasn't schmutz on my lens since it wasn't there on the pics immediately before and after. i also don't believe it was a balloon. to me the dark grey or black, disc-shaped object appears to have a lighter glow or aura around it when seen in extreme close-up. perhaps you have the ability to better analyze the image.  i would like to know if anyone else reported seeing anything or if anything appeared on radar. i am an experiencer and have and many sightings over the years. just before i started taking the pics i was looking at a very dramatic gap in the clouds with sunlight streaming thru and thought how cool it would be if a ufo were to come flying thru.  then, i mentally asked the ets for a sighting. this is the first time i've ever captured anything on film and am very excited.
content.summary: Image captured while taking pics of dramatic clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
This has been my second sighting the first sighting was almost the same over the treetops facing east towards tacoma where two military basses are ft lewis and mccord air force base at first my dad said maybe their testing or mortors but we cslled and that night the military base was silent as we can hear mirroring also nonsouhds of aircraft and the bases went using anything in that area they said 
last night was the same way 4 or 5 lights showed up and moved weird shifted diagnol light pulsated of them then dim turned to really bright and they would almost jump bibut a light trail was seen.
my s4 camera takes terrible video and pics at night standing as our house is over the water which their lights reflected off the oceans surface. i added a picture standing in my bedroom facing east and the ufos were over the trees on the other side of the water in the photo
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Diagnol paths and hovering closing in on each other almost like they went through one another and also the lighting changed

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from port jervis we were on rt 209 north at 7:30-8:00pm. a bright light was on my left. my son said it looked like a plane with headlights. from where i was it was 1/2 inch above the mountain ridge. while watching it, it just popped out of sight. i searched the sky looking in all directions but there was no sight of it anywhere.  the night was clear! i got very excited and couldn't stop thinking about it all night!
content.summary: Bright light hovering just above the mountain observed for 2 min to 5 min then disappeared like it blinked out

content.detailedDescription: I walked into my bedroom to open my windows and saw a strange group of lights hovering low in the western sky.  i've never seen anything like it before.  i went into the kitchen and got my cellphone and went outside to try and film the event. i could see the lights out in the distance, but i have a block wall and the lights were low and close to the horizon.  i climbed onto a chair to get a better view.  my security lights were on and disturbed the darkness, but the lights were still clearly visible.  i tried to hold my phone over my head to record the event.  i watched the lights in a formation of sorts, but not really a rigid formation, there was some drifting.  the lights seemed to be slowly headed away from me, towards the west. i observed an object cross the path of the lights and can't tell if it was one of the lights or an airplane or helicopter. one light seemed to fade then came back to original brightness.  i heard no sound, probably because of distance from me and i cannot estimate how far away they were. i called my daughter because the lights seemed to be in the direction of her house.  she was driving at the time and did not see anything.  the lights slowly faded in the distance and then were gone.  i called the local fox news station and asked if anyone else reported lights and was told no.
content.summary: Grouping of lights hovering in western sky.  appeared to be in some formation

content.detailedDescription:
1. smoking a cigarette near beach
2. friend told me to look
3. i have prior military so at first maybe sky divers untill i realized they were orbs 
4. two lights moving in sync started to expand and make other circles  then disappear 
5. shocked ,  couldn't take my eyes off, and a little scared
6.It disappeared
content.summary: Two circles that started expanding disappear and reappear

content.detailedDescription: My husband, 11 year old granddaughter and i were enjoying a warm summer evening out on our deck when we (all) witnessed 2 brilliant white lights in the sky flying at the same speed and direction and coming closer to us. at first we thought it was a small plane as an airport is about 2 miles away, but as they got closer, we thought they might be drones. it was an amusing situation at first. after moving in our direction, we realized that they (at the same time) stopped and seemingly hovered for several seconds (though it seemed longer at the time) over some close trees at which point i said "hey maybe they're aliens"... and we had a good laugh - for just a couple of seconds. i started jumping up and down waving my arms toward the lights still thinking they were drones (except that after the fact, we realized they were absolutely dead silent) and my granddaughter and i were yelling "hey - here we are!!". only a couple seconds later, they raced off at a very high speed and away from us in slightly different directions; one seemingly following the other and in less than 4-5 seconds, they were completely gone! it was at this point we all looked at each other in disbelief and were like "oh my god - those were ufo's!!". excited at first but after telling the story to my daughter, she sort of thought we all crazy (or making it up!), so we have kept it to ourselves as "our secret" until i decided to tell the story here. ever since that night, i look up at the sky every clear night i can, and wonder what they were and where they went and hoping they'll come back! it was such an amazing experience but yet i have also been plagued by strange and very realistic dreams and some nightmares about the incident and what might have happened! i am so thrilled to have had this experience in my life, even though i don't dare tell people i know for fear they will think i'm nuts!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed 2 brilliant white lights approx 20 ft apart: thought tthey may be drones but silent; then after coming close sped off and out of sight in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing near my car in front of a small shop across the street. the place is a commercial neighborhood. when suddenly i spotted something coming from the north direction. it was slow moving but pretty close it looked no so big probably smaller than a sedan car. at first i thought it was a plastic bag flown by the wind but the surprise was when it go closer and i started seeing the details of the object it was so amazing! it had weird like crystal structures coming in and out from reality it looked like a physical object but also like it was coming from another dimension it looked alive like a biological ufo. i also saw that it changes shape to a hairy like structure and when the ufo came right on top of me and i saw the color of it it was between dark reflective green and black i couldnt identified thats why it looked like its coming from a virtual reality sometimes it looks solid and sometimes it looks jelly. i even asked two of the shop owners and they coundt identify it. 

when the object passed me i starting following it and it became much higher to the point it reached the clouds and thats where it became like a circular physical object with fuzzy edges. it was a perfect camouflage with the clouds. i took pictures during all of this but it was with my iphone4 camera and its not that clear even after i zoom in. still am pretty sure its not an airplane or drone or anything usual. 

i have already heard about shape shifting ufos but i never thought they are real! now i know its true.
content.summary: Shape shifting crystal/hairy like structure  ufo

content.detailedDescription: Me my girlfriend and two of my friends went down to the flatlands in our town. on the way to the spot we hang out at the driver my friend noticed a bright orb on the left hand side of his car far above a few. it disappeared very quickly and he didn't say anything about it until later. and we arrived at the spot my other friend jumped out the car screaming what is that what is that. he began chasing whatever he saw and later described it as a fireball that just came out overhill directly next to us. he described it as a big red flaming ball as close as a hundred feet from us that took off at a very high speed.With the rest of this not believe in him we continue to hang out on this roadinmiddle of the flats late at night.As my friends and my girlfriend said by the car talking i was in the middle of the street facing down the opposite direction of the street.When in the blink of an eye a giant white glowing ball appeared right before me directly above the street approximately 50 feet ahead of me and a hundred feet in the air. the ball appear to be growing in the purely bright white light and just hovered there staring at me. i still have no clue whether to where it was a solid craft or just pure light but as quick as it came it shot off to my left hand direction leaving a slight trail behind it. this object was too close to b mistaken for any helicopter or crop duster let alone a weather balloon. the way it moved and disappeared was as if magic with its unreal speed and not to mention that it made absolutely no sound what so ever. my friends and i continue to bring up that odd night we expirenced together repeatedily. and it wasn't our only expirence eother . only our most close up expirence. for more info on this happening or our other expirence or for a more detailed report and exact locations and eye witnesses please don't hesitate to make contact
content.summary: Three large glowing balls of light were witnessed by me and my friends one night out in the flat lands of our town. these crafts were extremely close to us when witnessed

content.detailedDescription: During the early morning of dec. 14, 2015, i was photographing meteors of the geminid meteor shower.  i was taking a 20 second exposures of an area in the southeastern sky.  when i decided to end the session, i brought the camera inside and went to sleep (it was past 4:30 am at this time).  the next day i went through the images to find those with meteors in the image.  while looking for meteors, i noticed something moving in successive frames.  as i looked further, i saw the object in 118 consecutive images.  it appears as an approximate 7th magnitude dot and moves from the southeast towards the eastern horizon.  as it approaches the final frame, the object appears to speed up.  the final frame shows the object when it is approximately 35-40 degrees above the horizon.  when the object is first seen, it is a small dot, but as the frames progress, the object's tracking length (light trail it left) appears to increase.  after noticing the object, i check the near earth object database to see if there was an asteroid passage near the time i was shooting and did not find anything for that date and time frame which in any way corresponded to the time i was made the images.  not finding anything to identify the object, i sent a description of the what i photographed which included the times, number of images and offered the images to the neo office if they wanted them.  i have not received an reply to this date.  i have also shown the images (i made a small mp4 of the images - small is a misnomer...It is about 5 meg in size and reduced in resolution) to friends of mine who are amateur astronomers and they have no idea of what it is. i am attaching the small video, but be warned, the object is difficult to see, but can be seen.  although the real time movement of the object took about 45 minutes, the video compresses that movement to slightly more than 30 seconds. i have marked the area it first appears with a red arrow.  the object is very difficult to see in the final 20 or so images, but it is there and can be seen better in the original files.  each of the original files is approximately 5.9 meg in size with a resolution of 5184x3456 pixels.  the total size of the 118 files is approximately 1.9 gigs.  if you are interested in the original files, contact me and we will discuss how your can get them.  i really would like to know what it was in the images.  i know it wasn't a meteor, nor was it a satellite.  i am hoping your organization might be able to identify the object.  if it is unknown, maybe it can further someone's research.
content.summary: Appeared in 118 images i shot while photographing meteors.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

this is something that have been intriguing me for years and after watching the video of a big object impacting planet jupiter about a week ago i thought it was time to share it.
 
a little more than three years ago, i was taking long exposures photos of the night sky (15 secs) testing my canon powershot elph. i took around 4 maybe 5 exposures. constellations auriga and parts of taurus, orion and gemini as well as planet jupiter are in the picture. looking at the pictures a couple of days later i noticed what seems to be an object on the west side of jupiter. i'm not sure if it was right next to jupiter or much closer to earth or maybe it is from planet earth but it looks like something that was far away. unfortunately i wasn't looking at the sky on that moment so i don't know how long it lasted. i compare it to an exposure that i took a minute later and the object isn't there. i checked for reflections or trails left due to camera movement during the exposure but couldn't find anything. i also can't understand how this object didn't leave a trail of itself across the sky considering that the picture is a 15 seconds exposure. that means that it was stationary and also rules out the possibility of being a satellite, meteorite or airplane. it's also way too bright to be one of jupiters moons. 
i had shown the picture to astrophotographers and friends with basic knowledge of long exposure imaging and they can't understand how the object didn't leave a trail, how is so bright or how was generated.  i even made a side by side picture comparison with the exposure i took a minute later (1 minute and 30 seconds apart to be exact). i rotated the pictures so that up is north-east and enhance them to better show the object shape and how many pixel it covered. the only difference between the two is that the camera was moved a little. the object is tiny but some shape can be appreciated.
my intention is to give the picture to a professional so that it can be analyzed and determine if this is really an ufo, terrestrial object or if it was caused by something else. 
i would like to have an answer and take this out of my head.

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the park & ride in shenandoah, va texting my daughter. i was looking down at my phone, i looked up and out of nowhere were 4 bright orange balls of light. i was in awe, i immediately got out of my vehicle and got my camera pulled up on my cell phone to take a photo. by the time i snapped a photo one of the lights had disappeared. i then called my daughter who was at home located .5 miles from my location, and told her to go outside and look into the sky, she was unable to see anything from our home location (sky view is obscured by trees and buildings). she immediately got into her car so she could come see what i was seeing. i told her to hurry because one of the lights had already disappeared. it took her approximately 2-3 minutes to get to the park and ride, at that point they had all disappeared. it was not a gradual disappearance, but sudden. 

i thought the objects were sky lanterns, though i have never seen one in person, i imagine they would look similar to this. i chalked it up to being sky lanterns and forgot about it until i seen a post on a local "confessions" page. a page where a person can submit anonymously thoughts, rants, feelings etc. the post stated it was from a f/59 who seen lights shoot from roundhead mountain, a mountain located in stanley, va a neighboring town. although this person did not give their exact location, in order to see roundhead mountain you have to be very close to stanley or in stanley, a minimum of about 10 miles, roundhead being even further into stanley at about 14 miles. this struck me as being a bit too far to see sky lanterns, two people seeing 4 lights at least 10 miles apart does not reasonably seem to equate to sky lanterns, though it may be possible. i am not familiar with their visibility range. 

it also struck odd to me that 3 of the lights were aligned almost perfectly, surely sky lanterns would not be able to align themselves. they moved slowly, almost as if they were simply floating, which lent credence to them being sky lanterns. they faded into the night as quickly as they arrived. another odd aspect was how they faded, it was almost too perfect, and in order. one after the other within seconds. 

i did not feel fear when i seen the lights, they were amazing to see, i was in awe. i always watch the skies and over the years i have seen a lot, but this was absolutely the most significant thing i have ever seen. i was a little shocked to see them and very excited. 

files numbered 6 & 7 are google search results, i googled 4 lights in the sky and found exactly what i seen but flipped the other direction. file 6 is the google image unedited. file 7 i flipped the photo to show my perspective. 

file 10 is a google maps street view of my location where i witnessed this.
content.summary: 4 bright lights, orange in color, slow moving, straight line

content.detailedDescription:
bright white circular cloud with rotating orbs and metallic light

observed in the sky, on a mildly cloudy day. it resembled a bright white cloud moving opposite direction of the other clouds. 

when i pulled out binoculars i observed 4 orbs rotating around the cloud as it moved across the sky. 

also had lights or some sort of metallic reflection emanating inside the cloud almost as if it was electrically charged.
content.summary: White cloud with rotating orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was headed north on my way home, i just stopped at our gravel road and was headed east when i looked to the north and had seen one light appear out of no where. i stopped in the middle of the road about to turn in my drive and watched, another lit up and then another. one went out and another went out and then they came back on. then one at a time they all three went out and i didn't see any more activity. i noticed my wife was still in her car and my 16 year old was out and he asked me if i saw the lights and i told him yes that's why i was sitting in the middle of the road. my wife did not see them she was busy on the phone when she pulled up. my son also informed me he has seen these lights before and told us about them but by the time he try's to say anything they are already gone.
content.summary: There were 3 orbs spread out a good distance from each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was comeing back from eating lunch in my car out side my place of empolyment denso maf. standing outside the entrance finnising a cigarette. it wasabout 3;15 am on my graveyardshift i happen to look up at thenight sky when i saw this red light emerge over the building it slitly to my left moving east to west as it did it got larger . im thinking what the hell is this . as it came on across i could tell there was more to it. whenn it got a little past me i could tell  it was a outlined square red light it never blinked or anything .When it got alittle more past me i could see that there were two. there was no sound what soever i could not see anythingeles around them just black sky they were so low and moving so slow i could not understand what was holding them up. these lights were red outlined square about fourty feet wide an sixty feet tall. i remember thinking they looked the tail lights of an old ford galuxy or fairlane. as it floted past i could not stand why i couldn"t see what it was attatched to with all the light in the parking lot i should have ben able to see the bottom of it. it never went up or dowwn it held astright an even path . i watched till it was almost out of site. this happen no more than three miles from mcgee tyson airport. what ever this was had to be at least 100ft wide.The reason i'm finilly reporting this is i watch your show an others like yours but i've never hear of any lights like this. thankyou.
content.summary: I notice the litghts come over the building where i was employed iwas dumdstruck

content.detailedDescription:
On april 5, 2016, at 5:55 est i was viewing the iss hd camera on my phone.  i noticed something i'd never seen before - a strange squiggle line on the left and what appeared to be a cloud of some sort on the right.  my first thought was that there was something wrong with the camera or lens.

then i saw a light appear in the distance.  it appeared to grow brighter and brighter before dimming again and disappearing altogether.  i'm unsure whether it was a satellite, but that seemed odd since it disappeared.  the sun also appeared to be shining from behind the iss, so if it were a reflection the image would have remained, but it dimmed and faded.

as the light dimmed so did the squiggly line and cloud, though you can still see them faintly.  

i began taking screen shots when i first noticed the images and continued until they were gone.  the last image is nasa's standard screen saying the cameras are transitioning or the signal has been lost.  some conspiracists believe nasa displays this messaging to hide anomalous objects or ufos.
content.summary: Anomaly viewed on international space station hd camera

content.detailedDescription: I have been awakened multiple times in my home by walking, knocking and come to the notice of no apparent humans. i awaken to multiple stints of de ja vu and multiple visitors to my home have physically seen apparitions, been touched, or heard disembodied voices all in the same areas of my apartment. there have also been times of my inability to speak or move while physically awake and seemingly some apparent memory loss. i feel deeply affected by these events myself also by my sudden sort of telepathic communication in past instances. this is now also blocked i must add due to my memory loss possibly, to where i now am even unable to make the slightest of decisions without thorough walk through over time sometimes. almost a severe form of indecision or lack of judgement sometimes maybe for the best description that i can give.
content.summary: No physical ufo spotted. i was inside my home where/where visitation occurred.

content.detailedDescription: Know other people that has seen it and  over time have other incounters with things
content.summary: Seen object at high rate off speed at high rate of speed then seen object right above trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out the window,
a light came out of nowhere just above the horizon
headed my direction (north)
she stopped moving and stood still for a few minutes.
he returned to move, this time to the east
at a faster rate.
until it disappeared over the horizon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light ball
content.locationName: Bento Gonalves, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 8:30am. i stepped out into the back courtyard of the house to go through to garage to retrieve newspaper on the driveway.As i was walking i happened to glance towards the house next door over the fence- eastward and i clearly recognized this craft slowly emerging from a low thick cloud. the craft was elliptically shaped and reflecting the sun tremendously. it was like it was made out of mirror. as i watched  it seemed to recognise my attention towards it as it would slowly retreat back into the cloud then emerge halfway out again a few seconds later. it did this repeatedly. it was a partly cloudy day
and there were patchy thick clouds sparsely spread out through the sky. when i first saw it my reaction was deep terror momentarily as this was not my first interaction with this. my childhood was turned upside down by this phenomena. however, it had been decades since my last conscious interaction, only dreams in between then and now. when i gained my bearings back i rushed back into the house to get binoculars. when i returned it was either gone or never re-emerged from the cloud again. i waited and watched for some time. i know it was 8:30am because i remember looking at the clock on the oven as i ran through the kitchen after the binoculars.I have studied them since childhood starting with library books about the subject. i have come to my own conclusions about them now which i will not discuss here in this type forum. thanks for this outlet.
content.summary: Appeared from inside low thick cloud,craft going 1/2 in& out of cloud slowly & repeatedly,knew i was watching.

content.detailedDescription:
very early sunday, april 3, 2016, in the wee hours of the morning around 3:00 a.M., i was scanning the night sky of minneapolis, minnesota via a webcam in that city which can be found online at a website called, "allskycam". as i watched the night sky via the webcam, i saw that the webcam picked up the very strange image of a cirle of "dashes" that glowed white as it hung in the sky. the object was located between the positions of south & west on the webcam and the info registered above the webcam at that particular moment was: "last upload was : 2016/04/03 02:58  utc." 

   again, my first impression of the object was that it was very odd & looked completely out of context, as it was an object consisting of  white, glowing, circular dashes simply hanging there in the sky. i quickly opened up another window on my pc & immediately searched for "youtube" videos of "ufos in minneapolis, minnesota".

   to my total shock & absolute amazement, i came across a video entitled, "the x files of minnesota_ over 100 reported ufo sightings in minnesota each year". the video lasts 3:07 min.S, but at its introduction at 0:29-0:37 sec.S, a picture of a ufo that had been seen in the minnesota night sky was shown. it was a picture of an object that had the appearance of a circle of glowing, white "dashes"! needless to say, it was the exact same object i myself had seen appear on the minneapolis, minnesota webcam & which is probably easily accessible for re-viewing again within the webcam's archives by contacting the owners of the webcam.
content.summary: at approximately 3:00 a.M. sunday, april 3, 2016  i saw, via an (internet) online webcam located in minneapolis, minnesota, a ufo in the night sky there. it had the appearance of a circle of glowing, white "dashes", as it hung in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: April 5, 2016 at approx. 855pm edt, i was outside of my home walking my dog. it was a very clear night and i live in a development just outside of the city of thomasville, ga. so the city lights do not effect the night sky. i was facing east, then turned to the west (the rear of my property overlooking a pond) then i noticed 2 pale white lights in the sky. one was following the other as if they were a part of something larger. the lights did not blink, this is what really got my attention, i listened for the sound of a plane or helicopter. nothing. the object was completely silent. it moved very smoothly over me and my home from west to east. slightly changing course to the ese and then back to the east. the object was not very high, i was low enough to almost make out a shape, but i couldn't say for sure what shape. it never stopped moving at a pretty low rate of speed until the lights suddenly disappeared maybe a 1/4 mile away. i did notice that something had gotten the attention of several dogs in the direction the object was moving as many of them began to bark shortly after the lights disappeared.
content.summary: 2 pale white lights in a line as if part of a larger object. the lights passed over myself and my house, then disappeared.
